data.title: Osteria Santa Domenica
data.meta_description: Welcome at Osteria Santa Domenica Fine Dining experience in the heart of Taormina Sicilian Boutique Restaurant Osteria Santa Domenica Welcome at Osteria Santa Domenica Restaurant in Taormina, my name is…
data.text:
Welcome at Osteria Santa Domenica Restaurant in Taormina, my name is Gianluca Savoca, born in Taormina, where I’ve experienced many years in the restaurant business. During 2014, I started my adventure with Red & White, now Osteria Santa Domenica, with the will to make people taste as much as I’ve learned during my gastronomy experience

Osteria Santa Domenica is a restaurant where you’ll find only high quality ingredients. From wine to fish, you will find always delicious recipes respectful of Sicilian tradition but still mixed up with a touch of personal taste.

Come and visit our restaurant settled in the heart of Taormina’s city center, for tasty experience into Sicilian flavors!

With a wine list made of more than 500 labels. For the first time in Taormina, people can taste or order a glass of any wine selected and provided in our wine list paired with the right dish.
